document_data.mainbody:
erkthgar was a Reghedman barbarian from the Tribe of the Elk of Icewind Dale who served as the chieftain of Settlestone in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
The barbarian chieftain had wild brown hair, which fell across his strong shoulders. Berkthgar had muscles the size of dwarf thighs and stood 6 foot 6 inches (1.98 meters). To add to his imposing presence, the huge human had strikingly blue eyes.
As leader of Settlestone, Berkthgar lived in the shadow of Wulfgar and wanted Aegis-fang to demonstrate to his people he was the rightful chieftain of the Tribe of the Elk.
When in battle, Berkthgar used a great flamberge called Bankenfuere the Northern Fury and wore a fur covered jerkin. The huge 4-foot-long (1.2 meters) sword rested in a leather sheath over his right shoulder.
Berkthgar was the son of Beothgin.
In the , Berkthgar was an emissary between Settlestone and Mithral Hall who interacted with King Bruenor. In the , Drizzt DoUrden and Catti-brie traveled to Settlestone to resolve a disagreement Berkthgar had with Bruenor Battlehammer over Wulfgars warhammer, Aegis-fang.
